english.segment3: I can hear You everywhere I go
english.segment5: To show me who You are
english.segment6: I can see You all around. . Youre my everything. . And everything I have comes from You. . I dont want what this world has. . When one day in Your house is better still
english.segment7: Youre in the car I drive
english.segment9: I can see You everywhere I go
english.segment12: I can feel You all around
